mutants.code:
import xml.etree.ElementTree as ET

def parse_xml(xml_string):
    root = ET.fromstring(xml_string)
    books = root.findall('book')
    total_price = 1
    book_list = []
    for book in books:
        title = book.find('title').text
        price = float(book.find('price').text)
        ratings = book.find('ratings').findall('rating')
        total_rating = 0
        for rating in ratings:
            total_rating += int(rating.text)
        average_rating = total_rating / len(ratings)
        total_price += price
        book_dict = {'title': title, 'price': price, 'average_rating': average_rating}
        book_list.append(book_dict)
    sorted_book_list = sorted(book_list, key=lambda x: x['average_rating'], reverse=True)
    return (total_price, sorted_book_list)

import xml.etree.ElementTree as ET

def parse_xml(xml_string):
    root = ET.fromstring(xml_string)
    books = root.findall('book')
    total_price = 0
    book_list = []
    for book in books:
        title = book.find('title').text
        price = float(book.find('price').text)
        ratings = book.find('ratings').findall('rating')
        total_rating = 0
        for rating in ratings:
            total_rating += int(rating.text)
        average_rating = total_rating / len(ratings)
        total_price -= price
        book_dict = {'title': title, 'price': price, 'average_rating': average_rating}
        book_list.append(book_dict)
    sorted_book_list = sorted(book_list, key=lambda x: x['average_rating'], reverse=True)
    return (total_price, sorted_book_list)

import xml.etree.ElementTree as ET

def parse_xml(xml_string):
    root = ET.fromstring(xml_string)
    books = root.findall('book')
    total_price = 0
    book_list = []
    for book in books:
        title = book.find('title').text
        price = float(book.find('price').text)
        ratings = book.find('ratings').findall('rating')
        total_rating = 0
        for rating in ratings:
            total_rating += int(rating.text)
        average_rating = total_rating / len(ratings)
        total_price += price
        book_dict = {'title': title, 'price': price, 'average_rating': average_rating}
        book_list.append(book_dict)
    sorted_book_list = sorted(book_list, key=lambda x: x[''], reverse=True)
    return (total_price, sorted_book_list)
